// In helper.ts or helper.tsx export const renderTicketToHTML = (bookingData = {}) => { // Default values or use data from bookingData const { slotId = "N/A", date = new Date().toLocaleDateString(), timeSlot = "N/A", paymentId = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 12).toUpperCase() } = bookingData; // Create HTML ticket template with inline styles return ` ParkEz Booking Confirmation

ParkEz Booking Confirmation

Dear Customer,

Thank you for choosing ParkEz. Your parking reservation has been confirmed.

Parking Slot: ${slotId}

Date: ${date}

Time Slot: ${timeSlot}

Location: Ajeenkya DY Patil Parking Zone

Transaction ID: ${paymentId}

Please show this confirmation email when arriving at the parking facility.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

© 2025 ParkEz. All rights reserved.

`; };

sourcesContent:
// In helper.ts or helper.tsx export const renderTicketToHTML = (bookingData = {}) => { // Default values or use data from bookingData const { slotId = "N/A", date = new Date().toLocaleDateString(), timeSlot = "N/A", paymentId = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 12).toUpperCase(), } = bookingData; // Create HTML ticket template with inline styles return ` ParkEz Booking Confirmation

ParkEz Booking Confirmation

Dear Customer,

Thank you for choosing ParkEz. Your parking reservation has been confirmed.

Parking Slot: ${slotId}

Date: ${date}

Time Slot: ${timeSlot}

Location: Ajeenkya DY Patil Parking Zone

Transaction ID: ${paymentId}

Please show this confirmation email when arriving at the parking facility.

If you have any questions, please contact our support team.

© 2025 ParkEz. All rights reserved.

`; };
